title: The Stock Market Faces Make-or-Break Tests: The Fed's Interest-Rate Decision and Earnings From Alphabet, Amazon, Apple, Meta, and Microsoft
text: The S&P 500 has been in a bull market for more than three years, but the stock market could stumble, depending on the outcome of several important events this week. The Federal Reserve will announce its interest-rate decision on Wednesday, and five big technology companies will report earnings on Wednesday and Thursday.

title: OpenAI CFO says Microsoft deal boosts capital raising efficiency
text: OpenAI's Chief Financial Officer Sarah Friar said in Riyadh on Wednesday that this week's deal with Microsoft allows the company to continue raising capital in a much less complex manner.

title: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella says Bill Gates warned him that investing in OpenAI would be like setting $1 billion on fire

title: 'Peacetime CEO': Microsoft resolves major dispute with OpenAI ahead of earnings
text: Microsoft and OpenAI resolved a major dispute, lifting fundraising restrictions for OpenAI. The new deal completes OpenAI's restructuring of its for-profit arm.

title: Tech Giants Power Market: MSFT, GOOGL, AMZN, AAPL & AMD Lead Charge
text: Technology stocks are on fire, with the SPX, NDX and $DJI hitting record highs. Olivier Blanchard attributes this surge to A.I.

title: The ‚ÄòMagnificent Seven' have never been this important to the stock market ‚Äî¬†and a big test lies ahead
text: The stock market is getting ever-more reliant on the ‚ÄúMagnificent Seven,‚Äù raising the stakes for a jam-packed week of technology earnings that could decide whether Wall Street's momentum has more room to run.

title: Deal With OpenAI Is Key for Microsoft: Alger's Crawford
text: Ankur Crawford, executive vice president and portfolio manager at Alger Capital, discusses the deal between OpenAI and Microsoft that clears the way for the ChatGPT maker to become a for-profit company. Crawford joins Caroline Hyde on ‚ÄúBloomberg Tech.

title: Microsoft sees 10x return on OpenAI stake after restructure
text: CNBC's MacKenzie Sigalos reports that Microsoft's investment in OpenAI is now valued at $135 billion ‚Äî a tenfold increase ‚Äî following a corporate restructure that hands control to the nonprofit OpenAI Foundation and redefines the terms of their partnership.

title: Big Tech earnings this week: What investors should expect
text: With five of the Big Tech giants reporting this week, Jessica Inskip weighs in on what the numbers could mean for AI demand and the market rally. Transcript: Caroline Woods: In terms of tech earnings, we have five of the big 7 on deck this week.

title: 3 'Magnificent 7' Stocks With Cheap Options Prices
text: Tim Cook's Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL) was last seen trading up 0.3% at $269.67, earlier surpassing the $4 trillion market cap level.

title: The 'Big 3' Tech Playbook: Why Apple, Amazon And Microsoft Keep Winning
text: Amazon.com Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) is expected to post steady third-quarter gains powered by strong cloud, advertising, and retail performance.

title: Microsoft market cap jumps to $4 trillion
text: The Investment Committee debate how to trade Microsoft as it crosses the $4 Trillion market cap.

title: Azure Drives MSFT's AI Strategy: Buy the Stock Before Q1 Earnings?
text: Microsoft's MSFT first-quarter fiscal 2026 results, scheduled to be reported on Oct. 29, are poised to showcase the company's continued momentum in cloud computing and AI infrastructure. (Read Now: Microsoft Before Q1 Earnings: Should Investors Buy the Stock?

title: Microsoft Headlines Magnificent Seven Earnings Blitz, Eyes Cup-With-Handle Breakout
text: Results from the majority of the Mag 7 will likely set the tone for the remainder of the fourth quarter.

title: Apple vs Microsoft stock as both hit $4.0 trillion market cap
text: Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL) and Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ: MSFT) have officially joined the $4 trillion club ‚Äì marking a historic moment in the tech sector's valuation race. Fuelled by solid iPhone 17 sales and surging demand for cloud-based AI infrastructure, both stocks have delivered impressive returns in recent months.

title: Nasdaq Index: Microsoft-OpenAI Deal Fuels AI Bid in US Indices Today
text: Nasdaq climbs midday as Microsoft-OpenAI deal fuels AI optimism. Tech leads gains while traders await the Fed's rate forecast and earnings flood.

title: Microsoft gets 27% stake in OpenAI, with $250B Azure commitment
text: Microsoft and OpenAI announced the long-awaited details of their new partnership agreement Tuesday morning ‚Äî with concessions on both sides that keep the companies aligned but not in lockstep as they move into their next phases of AI development.

title: Microsoft's stock rises as new OpenAI partnership comes as a relief¬†to investors
text: The new agreement values Microsoft's 27% stake at $135 billion and extends its IP rights through 2032, giving Microsoft investors ‚Äúupside optionality.‚Äù

title: The $4 trillion club: how Nvidia, Microsoft, and Apple are rewriting capitalism
text: The balance of global corporate power has entered a new age. For the first time in history, three companies, Nvidia, Microsoft, and Apple, each hover around or beyond the $4 trillion valuation mark, a milestone that redefines not only scale but the very mechanics of value creation.

title: Microsoft's $135B stake in OpenAI, why Microsoft and Google are well-positioned for earnings
text: Morning Brief anchor Julie Hyman breaks down the latest market news for October 28, 2025. Julie speaks with Jessica Inskip of Stockbrokers.com to discuss Big Tech earnings due out this week.

title: OpenAI may move forward with new business structure, partnership with Microsoft, regulator says
text: OpenAI said Tuesday it has reorganized its ownership structure and converted its business into a public benefit corporation and a crucial regulator, the Delaware attorney general, said she approved the plan.

title: Apple and Microsoft are now both worth more than $4T
text: Apple and Microsoft are now both worth more than $4 trillion each.

title: MSFT Pops on OpenAI Agreement, Consumer Confidence Trends Higher
text: Ahead of Wednesday's earnings, Microsoft (MSFT) jumped Tuesday morning after restructuring its deal with OpenAI. As Kevin Green explains, it changes the stake Microsoft has in the company but adds clarity to OpenAI's future with Azure cloud.

title: Microsoft Stock Rises and Hits $4 Trillion Market Cap
text: Apple briefly passes the $4 trillion mark alongside Microsoft on Tuesday.

title: OpenAI completes recapitalisation, helping shareholder Microsoft pass $4trn valuation
text: OpenAI has completed a long-awaited corporate recapitalisation that hands its nonprofit arm¬†a large equity stake in the company, and gave major shareholder¬†Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ:MSFT)¬†an extra boost to reach a $4 trillion market valuation. OpenAI and Microsoft also announced the "next chapter" of their partnership will see a loosening of exclusivity, adding new provisions that enable each company to independently continue advancing innovation and growth.

title: Wall Street is Pounding the Table Over AAPL, AMZN, QCOM, GFI, MSFT
text: The image featured for this article is ¬© ene / Shutterstock.com

title: VIEW Wall Street reacts to Microsoft and OpenAI's new deal
text: Microsoft and OpenAI on Tuesday said they had reached a deal to allow the ChatGPT maker to restructure itself into a public benefit corporation, valuing OpenAI at $500 billion and clearing the way for it to become a publicly traded company.

title: Microsoft to Get 27% Stake of OpenAI, AI Model Access Until 2032
text: Microsoft and OpenAI finalized a new agreement that will see Microsoft get a 27% ownership stake in OpenAI, worth about $135 billion, and access to the artificial intelligence startup's technology until 2032, including models that achieved the benchmark of AI general intelligence. Caroline Hyde reports on Bloomberg Television.

title: OpenAI Converts to Public Benefit Corporation With Microsoft Taking 27% Stake
text: OpenAI's for-profit arm finalized its conversion into a public benefit corporation and reached a deal with Microsoft that will see the tech giant take a 27% stake.

title: Apple, Microsoft cross $4 trillion market cap for the first time
text: Apple passed a market cap of $4 trillion for the first time. Microsoft also reached the benchmark.

title: OpenAI completes restructure, solidifying Microsoft as a major shareholder
text: OpenAI completes restructure, solidifying Microsoft as a major shareholder

title: Microsoft, OpenAI reach new deal to allow OpenAI to restructure
text: Microsoft said on Tuesday it has reached a deal with OpenAI to allow the ChatGPT maker to restructure itself into a public benefit corporation, following which Microsoft would hold a stake of about $135 billion - or 27% - in the AI startup.

title: ENow Launches App Governance Accelerator 3.1 with Unified App View and Intelligent Workflow Automation for Microsoft Entra ID
text: ALISO VIEJO, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- #Cybersecurity--ENow launches App Governance Accelerator 3.1 with Unified App View and intelligent automation to simplify Entra ID application governance.

title: Dan Ives Sees Microsoft Stock Headed to $5T Market Cap
text: Wedbush Securities' Dan Ives is one of the bigger bulls on Wall Street, and while he has high expectations for the many Magnificent Seven members, I do find his Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) call to be one of the most intriguing.

title: Microsoft's stock is in need of a jolt. Here's how earnings could fuel a breakout.
text: Microsoft reports earnings on Wednesday, and analysts see the potential for further acceleration in its cloud business as well as major benefits from a Windows refresh cycle.

title: Should You Buy Microsoft Stock Before This Huge Investor Update?
text: Microsoft (MSFT +1.51%) is scheduled to provide an investor update where they will discuss progress on developing artificial intelligence.
